Student Assistance Programs

My Campus Health proudly partners with D’Accord to provide education institutions with Student Assistance Programs.

darccodoas.com

You can learn more at D’Accord website by clicking Try our service

What can

What can I expect?

Through our SAP, we offer short term professional counselling with an experienced psychologist. Appointment needs to be made in advance for face to face or telephone counselling.
What if

What if my English

is not good?

A professional interpreter can be arranged at no cost to you if you need an interpreter, you will need to contact us at the time of making your appointment.
What will

What will it cost?

Our SAP counselling is free of charge to you. The service is provided independently by us, D'Accord OAS, and your organization meets the cost of your session. On occasion, your counsellor may suggest that more specialized assitance would be useful. In this instance, you will be referred to an appropriate service.
How do

How do I call?

All you have to do is call +61 444 563 823 to be connected directly with the D'Accord office.
